1.0.name: wordpress/search-plugin-contents
1.0.description:
This plugin allows developers to select from a list of installed plugins, and input a string or regular expression that the plugin will use to search through the entire plugin directory for and return results to the user.

This alleviates the frustration of having to search through several files in a plugin for a specific function declaration or configuration variable.
